title: After reading HTML and CSS Design?
__content:
After reading 'HTML and CSS Design', I have a deeper understanding on HTML and CSS, but I have some new question to ask. I will jot down my question and do research on it.

  1. What is the different between <strong>, <em>, <b> and <i>?
  • http://stackoverflow.com/questions/271743/whats-the-difference-between-b-and-strong-i-and-em
  1. What HTML tag should we use for button?
  • <button>
  • <input type="button">
  • <a>
  • <div>
  1. Pseudo Class vs Pseudo Element
  2. <s> vs <del>
  3. <address> tag
  4. DOCTYPE
  5. Mandatory elements
  6. Mandatory attributes
